releases.notes: No real changes, just demo for release tool.

name: Wolfenstein 3D Pain Face
description:
Show your level of pain with a Wolfenstein 3D inspired pain face.

 * Use W'bal, heart rate or power output for the pain source.
 * State of the art graphics (for 1992)
 * May induce feelings of nostalgia.
 * Mein Leben!!!

releases.notes:
version 1.7.0
- adds an option to the points leaderboard for FTS per event scoring (aka ZRL style)
- adds an option for a solid background colour for the points leaderboard
- future proofing for when Zwift adds new pens to a world
- if you enable the "show gaps" option for robopacers on the elevation profile, it will also show how many people (and lately, bots) are in the group.

Note that the points leaderboard analysis page is only partially updated for the FTS per event settings.  The total points shown should be correct but if you expand a rider or switch to segment view, it will show points as if it was FTS per repeat.

name: Zenmaster
description:
Arend's Mod Collection

* Fully customizable route elevation profiles
* See the active powerups in your group when the HUD is off
* Segment leaderboards
* Preview route and segment profiles
* Pace partner routes and current locations
* Lap data windows for workouts
* Leaderboards for points races

name: Costco Guys BOOM

releases.notes:
primetime release
* hobby project during recovery
* have fun!

description:
A Sauce Mod meme's included.
* set a threshold
